overview: Jason Ridge who has been named the hottest Hollywood leading man decides to head to Palm Springs for a little rest and relaxation, but he gets more then he bargained for under the hot desert sun. This movie has all the makings of a true Hollywood drama if you always wondered if that incredibly hot leading man was gay or not, and you would do anything to find out. Roman Heart is determined to get to the bottom of it and out Jason Ridge to get that next big role. "A Rising Star" is full of deception and betrayal while the stakes are high the payoff is so sweet.
title: A Rising Star
